title: Hyundai Motor gearing up to drive into Indian capital market
description: Hyundai has hired several investment banks to manage the IPO and is targeting a valuation of $22-28 billion. The IPO could lead to a rerating of the Indian automobile sector and benefit Hyundai's closest rival, Maruti Suzuki.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
